channel.title: Food Sex on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Food Sex on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: tonight i stayed in.
item.description: i worked. and then I went and got my hair trimmed. haha. I mean shorn. after that I came home and PASSED out. it ruled. slept until about 9 or 10. ordered some food. watched ‘bend it like beckham’ and then watched ‘platonic sex.’ both were quite good. ‘bend it like beckham’ was really funny - I really liked it. sorta dumb - but really nice. ‘platonic sex’ was quite good - incredibly weird.
